# WKMediaCaptureState.none

**Case**

The media device is off.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Constants

- **WKMediaCaptureState.active**: The media device is actively capturing audio or video.
- **WKMediaCaptureState.muted**: The media device is muted, and not actively capturing audio or video.

items.description: The media device is actively capturing audio or video.
items.name: WKMediaCaptureState.active

items.description: The media device is muted, and not actively capturing audio or video.
items.name: WKMediaCaptureState.muted
